Disease.Name: CARDIOMYOPATHY, FAMILIAL HYPERTROPHIC, 6 (CMH6)
Disease.Summary: very rare;autosomal dominant;mutation in the PRKAG2 gene;glycogen accumulation in the cardiac tissue;We highlight the potential for patients with ;PRKAG2; mutations to mimic Pompe disease in infancy and the need for confirmatory testing when diagnosing Pompe disease [Torok RD 2017]
